1.title: A Mr. Monkey Halloween
1.plot: It's Halloween and trick-or-treaters are stopping by Mr. Monkey's garage for some tricks and treats. Mr. Monkey has a great time guessing who each trick-or-treater is dressed as. Funny thing is, they're all dressed in the same costume. Can Mr. Monkey figure out who they're pretending to be on this fun and festive night?

2.title: Professor Porcupine's Unusual Truck Problem
2.plot: A star is born. In this very special cartoon episode, the town's theatre teacher, Professor Porcupine, visits Mr. Monkey's garage with a very unusual problem. His truck will only drive in circles. Can Mr. Monkey help Professor Porcupine's truck drive in a straight line again? Will Professor Porcupine win an award for his off-off-way-off-Broadway performance? Let's watch and find out.

3.title: The Elephant Family's Van is Too Small
3.plot: A very big elephant family has an enormous problem. Their van is too small to fit the members of their whole family. What can Mr. Monkey do to make sure everyone has a comfortable seat? First, he starts with a plan. Then, he gets to work. See how Mr. Monkey solves the problem.

4.title: Coach Moose and His Hockey Team Need Help!
4.plot: Coach Moose and his hockey team, the Junior Rangers, drop into Mr. Monkey's garage with a problem - they're in town for a big hockey game but they can't skate on the lake - it's too bumpy. What can Mr. Monkey do? The team really wants to play. Mr. Monkey doesn't fix ice...but he comes up with idea that just might work. What is it? Watch and find out, eh?

5.title: Mr. Skunk's Stinky Garbage Truck
5.plot: Mr. Skunk has a putrid problem with his garbage truck. It's so stinky it's bothering everyone in town. What can Mr. Monkey do?. With the help of his trusty monkey wrench and a little something special, Mr. Monkey comes up with a great idea that's a breath of fresh air. What's Mr. Monkey's refreshing solution? Watch and find out.

1.title: Mr. Giraffe's Car Is Too Small
1.plot: Mr. Giraffe has a problem. His car has turned out to be a real pain in the neck. So he takes it to Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic's car garage to see if he can fix it. Using his handy monkey wrench and some engineering skills, Mr. Monkey gets to work!. If your kids like Carl's Car Wash and The Bumble Nums, they'll love Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic.

2.title: Mr. Chameleon's Car Needs New Paint
2.plot: In this edition Mr. Chameleon wants his car to match the colour of his clothes, but he's always changing colours. Can Mr. Monkey figure out a way to paint Mr. Chameleon's car a colour that will make him happy?

3.title: Mrs. Penguin's Ice Cream Truck Is Too Hot!
3.plot: In this installment, the ice cream in Mrs. Penguin's ice cream truck is melting because it's too hot. Can Mr. Monkey figure out a way to keep her ice cream truck cool in the hot, hot sun?

4.title: Mr. Lion's Horn Is Too Quiet
4.plot: Mr. Lion's Jeep doesn't sound right. The horn just isn't ...lion-y enough. Can Mr. Monkey and his handy monkey wrench solve the problem?

5.title: Ms. Owl's Hot Air Balloon is Hard to See at Night
5.plot: Ms. Owl enjoys her nightly rides in her big hot balloon, but other birds keep bumping into it. Can Mr. Monkey and his trusty monkey wrench solve the problem? Let's watch and find out.

6.title: Mr. Sloth's Car Is Too Fast & Ms. Rabbit's Car Is Too Slow
6.plot: Mr. Sloth and Ms. Rabbit are not happy with their cars. One moves too slow and the other way too fast. How can Mr. Monkey figure out a way to solve this problem? Let's watch and find out.

7.title: Captain Crocodile's Boat Keeps Floating Away
7.plot: Captain Crocodile's boat keeps on floating away, even when it's secured. Although he is a great swimmer, he's tired of going after it. Can Mr. Monkey solve a problem like this? Let's sit back and watch.

8.title: Mr. Husky Misses Pulling his Sled in Winter
8.plot: Mr. Husky loves pulling his sled in winter. But in summer, he doesn't know what to do. Can Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic help to resolve this problem? Watch to find out.

9.title: Young Turtle's Topsy-Turvy Bicycle Trouble
9.plot: Young Turtle comes into the garage with a bicycle that's too tipsy and wobbly. Mr. Monkey does his typical vehicle testing but finds the bike to be in tiptop shape. Maybe the problem doesn't have to do with the bike, but with the rider?

10.title: Ms. Poodle's Hairy Car Situation
10.plot: Ms. Poodle stops by Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic's garage with a hair-brained problem - every time she gets her hair done, it's ruined the moment she drives away. Can Mr. Monkey fix her car? Only if he has his trusty monkey wrench and a plan.

11.title: Little Doggy's Wheelchair Gets a Makeover
11.plot: Mr. Monkey is having a party and his first guest has arrived a wee bit early - it's Little Doggy in his wheelchair. Can Mr. Monkey fancy-up his wheelchair? He certainly can with a plan and his trusty monkey wrench.

12.title: Santa's Sleigh Needs Major Repairs
12.plot: It's Christmas Eve, and Mr. Monkey, Monkey Mechanic is paid a visit by Santa whose sled is broken. Santa's sled is too damaged to fix in time for him to make his flight around the world. Oh no. Christmas will be ruined. Or, will it?

14.title: Ms. Squirrel's Nutty Problem
14.plot: Ms. Squirrel has a problem with her car and it's driving her absolutely nutty. When Mr. Monkey checks her car, he discovers nuts, nuts, and more nuts. They're clogging up her car and that's why it's not working. Good thing Mr. Monkey has an idea...and his trusty monkey wrench. Mr. Monkey gets to work and fixes her problem.
